metadata.synopsis: Players realize the Gith Radar must have beeped to alert them about the incoming Gith attack.Tries to play on Laezel first if she is nearby and available.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Party comments about what the Gith Radar did after the battle against the ambushers is finished.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Gith hunters. That must be why that device sounded out.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: The psionic detector alerted us to the githyanki attack. Looks like Voss was good for his word.
